get libraries & load data
```{r setup, collapse=TRUE, warning=FALSE}
require(psych)

#load data
d1 = read.csv('/Users/kelly/cueexp/data/q_demo_data/data_controls_190326.csv')


```

#pairs plots 1: age and motion

```{r pairs plot1, collapse=TRUE, warning=FALSE}

dp = with(d1, data.frame(nacc_inferior_fa,nacc_inferior_md,BIS,age,dwimotion))
          
pairs.panels(dp)

```

#pairs plots 2: TIPI

```{r pairs plot2, collapse=TRUE, warning=FALSE}

dp = with(d1, data.frame(nacc_inferior_fa,nacc_inferior_md,BIS,tipi_extra,tipi_agree,tipi_consci,tipi_emostab,tipi_open))

pairs.panels(dp)

```       

#pairs plots 3: discount BIS/BAS, and BDI

```{r pairs plot3, collapse=TRUE, warning=FALSE}

dp = with(d1, data.frame(nacc_inferior_fa,nacc_inferior_md,BIS,discount_rate,basdrive,basfunseek,basrewardresp,bisbas_bis,BDI))

pairs.panels(dp)

```
